mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{user_id},#{product_id},#{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.user_id, c.product_id, c.quantity, p.product_id, p.name, p.price, p.stock, p.description FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
